channel.title: Comcast Corporation on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Comcast Corporation on FinanClub

item.title: 1143 CMCSA
item.description: score:1143 Chances: Comcast partnered with NBCUniversal Telemundo Enterprises and Women in Sports Tech to celebrate the FIFA Women’s World Cup, which could enhance the company’s brand image and engagement with sports fans. Go Addressable and Advertiser Perceptions released findings on the growth and adoption of addressable advertising, which could indicate potential opportunities for Comcast in the advertising market.
